targets.expr:
sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="app", container="cart-service"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="app", container="cart-service", resource="cpu"})

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="app", container="cart-service"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="app", container="cart-service", resource="cpu"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="app", container="cart-service"}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="app", container="cart-service", resource="memory"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="app", container="cart-service"}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="app", container="cart-service", resource="memory"})
{app="cart-service", level=~"ERROR|INFO"} |~ "(?i)$logs_search"
sum by (service, span_name) (traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{service="cart-service", span_name=~"$endpoint"})

sum by (service, span_name) (traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{
        service="cart-service", status=~"4..|5..", span_name=~"$endpoint"})
sum by (db_system, span_name) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{service="cart-service", repository_name=~"$repo"}[1m]))
sum by (rpc_service, span_name) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{service="cart-service", rpc_service=~"$grpc_service"}[1m]))
